dct_title_s: Mapa de la República Oriental del Uruguay
dct_description_sm: Map shows departmental boundaries; 12 classes of roads; railroads, and airports. Some sites are shown pictorially. Includes distance table, notes of tourist interest, and index. On lower right margin of map: "48-6-52" "P. M. Cat. C. 2681." Copyright, General Drafting Co., Inc., Convent Station, NJ
dct_publisher_sm: Convent Station, NJ. : General Drafting Co., Inc., [1952]
